title: Broadcast
description: Testing, 1, 2. We Are Live.In "Broadcast", radio DJ Klaus Kleinberg, who isn't always politically correct, and has sharp opinions, has a popular radio show. Klaus isn't afraid to speak his mind, and his main goal, is to create an entertaining show, pushing the limits. When Klaus is presented with a group of friends, a Bus Driver, a Janitor, a Journalist, an Artist, and an Army Veteran, he and these men, take their adventures, to a whole new level.Will Klaus and his associates achieve victory? Or are they in for a rude awakening. Remember everything is live, so anything can happen. It is all now being, "Broadcast"
author: Brennen Tammons
